title: Check Life Insurance Application Status
description: An applicant who applied for life insurance two weeks ago is calling to check the status.

tasks.description: Identify the applicant using their personal information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully locates the pending application.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current status from the underwriting system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the application status is 'Pending review of paramedical exam results'.

tasks.description: Inform the applicant of the status and provide an estimated timeline for the next steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the status and that a decision is expected within 5-7 business days.
